poem:
**Echoes of Dialogue**

In the land where voices roam,  
podcast words weave fate's loom.  
A nation's future sways on air—  
conversations spun, raw, bare.

From digital pulpits, whispered truth,  
people gather in their chosen booth.  
Ears lean closer, hearts sift light—  
shadows of tomorrow blurred in night.
prompt: You are the poet RS Thomas. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Musk says Trump’s podcast appearances made ‘big difference’ in election Donald Trump’s stunning election triumph was won partly thanks to his willingness to undergo freewheeling interviews with popular podcasters like Joe Rogan, the US president-elect’s most influential backer, Elon Musk, has claimed. Speaking to Tucker Carlson, Musk said Trump’s three-hour conversational encounter last month with Rogan – America’s most-listened-to podcaster – and other podcast appearances allowed listeners to decide whether he was a “good person”". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Musk says Trump’s podcast appearances made ‘big difference’ in election Donald Trump’s stunning election triumph was won partly thanks to his willingness to undergo freewheeling interviews with popular podcasters like Joe Rogan, the US president-elect’s most influential backer, Elon Musk, has claimed. Speaking to Tucker Carlson, Musk said Trump’s three-hour conversational encounter last month with Rogan – America’s most-listened-to podcaster – and other podcast appearances allowed listeners to decide whether he was a “good person”
